name: Mix-Step
description:
Mix-Step is a rhythm based game much like DDR or Rockband, but with the twist that you can create your own music. Using several instruments, use the custom editor to bring your music creativity to life. Once you have created a few tracks, then play those tracks.

***This game was created for the Music Game Jam 2018 and should be treated as a prototype. Android is much more "alpha" than the pc build.
